name: SimpleAppLinks
author: ryomatsu

sections.description:
SimpleAppLinks displays link to application and extension on your WordPress
posts and pages.

Supported platform is below…

  • Google Play
  • iTunes App Store
  • Mac App Store
  • Windows Store
  • Chrome Web Store
  • Firefox Add-ons
  • WordPress Plugins

How to Use

SimpleAppLinks uses ‘applink’ shortcode with url parameter. Like this…

[applink
url=”https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.loumo.paydaycounter”]

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload simpleapplinks to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload simpleapplinks to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress

A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.
